title: Can The EDD offset my Federal income tax return or just my CA refund
question: Called the( Top) number and it says they got the amount but not sure if it was from the CA refund or the federal .
answers: Yes they can and routinely do. You or a tax professional should make contact with them to determine a plan to get you out of collections. Options are a monthly installment plan, a hardship, or an Offer in Compromise.
If they follow the procedure yes, they can have your federal refund intercepted and used to offset debts you owe the state.
